title: Movie Magic!
description: Tell us about your favorite films!

questions.label: What's your favorite genre of movie?
How often do you watch movies at home?
Would you recommend our movie streaming service to a friend?

title: Coffee Break!
description: Help us understand your coffee habits!

questions.label: How do you typically drink your coffee?
What's your favorite brand of coffee?
Do you prefer hot or iced coffee?
What time of day do you usually drink coffee?
On average, how many cups of coffee do you drink per day?
Do you consider yourself a coffee addict?
What are your favorite coffee shop recommendations?

title: Wanderlust Survey
description: Share your travel dreams and experiences!

questions.label: What type of travel experience do you prefer?
What is your dream travel destination?
When do you typically travel (time of year)?
How much do you typically budget for a vacation?
Do you prefer to travel solo or with others?
What amenities are most important to you in a hotel?
What are your top 3 travel essentials?
Have you ever used a travel booking app or website?
If so, which travel booking app or website do you prefer?
How important is eco-friendly travel to you?
Describe a travel experience that stands out to you the most. Why was it memorable?
What travel styles are you most interested in trying in the future?
What are some challenges you face when planning or taking trips?
What are your top travel tips for others?
Anything else you'd like to share about your travel experiences or preferences?

title: Music Mania!
description: Share your musical tastes with us!

questions.label: What kind of music do you listen to the most?
Who is your favorite artist or band of all time?
Do you prefer to listen to music on streaming services, the radio, or physical media (CDs, vinyl, etc.)?
When do you typically listen to music?
Do you play any musical instruments? If so, which ones?
Have you ever been to a music concert or festival? If so, what was your most memorable experience?
options: Yes, but it wasn't that memorable.
No, but I'd like to go sometime.

questions.label: What are some of your favorite music genres to discover new music in?
Is there anything else you'd like to share about your music preferences?

title: Foodie Fun!
description: Tell us about your culinary adventures!

questions.label: What kind of cuisine do you enjoy the most?
What is your favorite dish to cook at home?
Do you prefer to eat out at restaurants often, occasionally, or rarely?
When choosing a restaurant, what factors are most important to you?
Do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences?
Have you ever tried a new cuisine that surprised you? If so, what was it?
options: Yes, but it wasn't my favorite.
I'm not interested in trying new things.

questions.label: What are some of your favorite ways to discover new restaurants?
What is your dream culinary experience?
